mapper.select: select m.*, u.name, fi.path i_path, ft.path t_path, fd.path d_path from mentor_apply m left join user u on m.mentor_u_id=u.id left join file fi on m.apply_f_intro_fk = fi.id left join file ft on m.apply_f_time_id = ft.id left join file fd on m.apply_f_doc_fk = fd.id WHERE m.id = #{m.id}

select m.*, u.name, fi.path i_path, ft.path t_path, fd.path d_path from mentor_apply m left join user u on m.mentor_u_id=u.id left join file fi on m.apply_f_intro_fk = fi.id left join file ft on m.apply_f_time_id = ft.id left join file fd on m.apply_f_doc_fk = fd.id
mapper.insert: INSERT mentor_apply (mentor_u_id, group_name, subject, year, grade, count, study_purpose, study_content, study_method, apply_f_time_id, apply_f_intro_fk, apply_f_doc_fk) VALUES (#{mentor_u_id}, #{group_name}, #{subject}, #{year}, #{grade}, #{count}, #{study_purpose}, #{study_content}, #{study_method}, #{apply_f_time_id}, #{apply_f_intro_fk}, #{apply_f_doc_fk})

INSERT report (subject, place, day, start_time, end_time, study_content, rep_f_photo_id, rep_u_id, rep_f_study_id) VALUES (#{subject}, #{place}, #{day}, #{start_time}, #{end_time}, #{study_content}, #{rep_f_photo_id}, #{rep_u_id}, #{rep_f_study_id})
mapper.update: UPDATE mentor_apply SET mentor_u_id = #{mentor_u_id}, group_name = #{group_name}, subject = #{subject}, year = #{year}, grade = #{grade}, count = #{count}, study_purpose = #{study_purpose}, study_content = #{study_content}, study_method = #{study_method}, open_date = #{open_date}, apply_f_time_id = #{apply_f_time_id}, apply_f_intro_fk = #{apply_f_intro_fk}, apply_f_doc_fk = #{apply_f_doc_fk} WHERE id = #{id}
